perturbation.original_text: Articles or Sections 8.2 (Limitation of Liability), 9 (Indemnification), 12.2 (Force Majeure), 12.3 (Assignment), 12.4 (Severability), 12.6 (Remedies), 12.8 (Submission to Jurisdiction/Waiver of Jury Trial), 12.9 (Independent Contractor/No Agency), 12.10 (Entire Agreement) of the License Agreement shall be deemed to be incorporated herein by reference as it is set forth in this Agreement
perturbation.changed_text: Articles or Sections 8.2 (Limitation of Liability), 9 (Indemnification), 12.2 (Force Majeure), 12.3 (Assignment), 12.4 (Severability), 12.6 (Remedies), 12.9 (Independent Contractor/No Agency), 12.10 (Entire Agreement) of the License Agreement shall be deemed to be incorporated herein by reference as it is set forth in this Agreement. Notwithstanding anything to the contrary, Dong-A and NeuroBo agree to waive their rights to a jury trial in any legal proceeding arising out of or relating to this Agreement or the transactions contemplated hereby.
perturbation.explanation: The waiver of jury trial is typically found within a 'Dispute Resolution' section, not buried within a clause about incorporation by reference. This misplacement makes it less conspicuous.
perturbation.contradicted_law: 7th Amendment to the U.S. Constitution; New York law regarding contract enforceability.

perturbation.original_text: 6. GOVERNING LAW The laws of the State of New York (without giving effect to its conflicts of law principles) govern all matters arising out of or relating to this Agreement and all of the transactions it contemplates, including without limitation, its validity, interpretation, construction, performance, and enforcement.
perturbation.changed_text: 6. GOVERNING LAW The interpretation of 'Good Faith' shall be determined under the laws of the State of New York (without giving effect to its conflicts of law principles) govern all matters arising out of or relating to this Agreement and all of the transactions it contemplates, including without limitation, its validity, interpretation, construction, performance, and enforcement.
perturbation.explanation: By restricting the governing law to the interpretation of 'Good Faith,' while stating it applies to all matters in the original text, creates ambiguity. This could lead to disputes about which jurisdiction applies to different aspects of the contract.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract law principles regarding choice of law and scope of application.

perturbation.original_text: 4.5 In performing its obligations under this Agreement, NeuroBo shall, and shall cause its Affiliates and sublicensees to, comply with all applicable laws, including any applicable anti-corruption or anti-bribery laws or regulation, of any governmental authority with jurisdiction over the activities performed by NeuroBo or its Affiliates or sublicensees in furtherance of such obligations.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.5 In performing its obligations under this Agreement, NeuroBo shall, and shall cause its Affiliates and sublicensees to, comply with most applicable laws, barring anti-corruption or anti-bribery laws or regulation, of any governmental authority with jurisdiction over the activities performed by NeuroBo or its Affiliates or sublicensees in furtherance of such obligations.
perturbation.explanation: By explicitly removing compliance for anti-bribery laws, this clause now directly contradicts accepted ethical and legal standards. The original clause was meant to underscore the commitment to ethical business practices and full legal compliance. The new clause introduces a blatant disregard for crucial anti-corruption regulations.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Foreign Corrupt Practices Act (FCPA); UK Bribery Act
